text: ...gece vakti, el çadırına baskın verip şehzade kaçıracak...
english: ...he will raid the encampment at night and kidnap the prince...
...and I will miss this feast. Is that even possible

text: ...gitsinler diye ağlayıp zırladığın insanların çadırına muhafız mı oldun?
english: crying and begging for those people to leave, and now you've become a guard at their tent?

text: Senin kafana göre biat toplayıp, bey olduğun obada...
english: In the tribe where you gather allegiance according to your own will and become the chieftain...

text: ...e bırak biz de muhafız oluverelim, emmi.
english: ...well, let us be your guards, uncle.

text: Hem bu obanın bir muhafızı olmalı.
english: This village must have a guard.

text: Olmalı ki it, köpek kuyruğunu sallaya sallaya obada dolaşmasın.
english: It's important that dogs don't wander around the village wagging their tails.
(Alpargu) My lord, Ertuğrul and his Alps have gone.
Gather the men you trust and send them after them.
...not to hesitate to shed blood if necessary .

text: Biz dere kenarından, siz de tepeden gidin!
english: We'll go along the stream, you go up the hill!
(Kurdoğlu) Listen to me carefully, Kayı Beys.

text: Hayme Ana, Ertuğrul böyle bir şey yapmaz.
english: Hayme Ana, Ertuğrul wouldn't do such a thing.

text: Bu haysiyetsiz, gemi azıya aldı iyice kızım.
english: This dishonorable man has completely lost control, my daughter.

text: Bu iftiralar, sahibinin kötü yüreğinin aynasıdır.
english: These slanders are a reflection of the wicked heart of their author.
...Gündoğdu, who killed our soldiers in the caravan raid...
In the feast that our Suleiman Shah did not gather...
...there is no place for us anymore.
Gündoğdu and Hayme Ana away from the tent.
(Selcan) The rest is up to you.

text: (Selcan) Süleyman Şah ölürse, ben babamın intikamını almış olacağım...
english: (Selcan) If Suleyman Shah dies, I will have avenged my father...
...and you will become the bey of Kayı.
Why is it so dark here?
Why are these lamps not lit, Rahman?
You wouldn't even know the world was ending!

text: Bir şeyler bulup şu yarığı kapat!
english: Find something to close this gap!
(Music - Percussion and strings) Nobody will ever know what

text: Burada olanlardan hiç kimsenin haberi olmayacak!
Babamın yanından bir an bile ayrılma!
english: leave my father's side for even a moment! Yes sir
(Grand Master) What is the state of the palace? We have placed our own

text: Hemen her mevkie bizden birilerini yerleştirmiş durumdayız.

english: His eyes are constantly on his nephew.
have plans for that too. Who helped

text: Sana Emir'in misafirini öldürmen için kim yardım etti?
El Aziz'in Atabey'i, Şahabettin Tuğrul yardım etti.
english: El Aziz's Atabey, Şahabettin Tuğrul, provided assistance. I couldn't
even become the sultan of the palace where I was born ...
...I can't become the sultan of your heart.
What does your heart say, Halime?

text: Dilim ne söylerse, yüreğimin de söylediği odur.
english: Whatever my tongue says, my heart says the same thing.
Let's part ways, we'll meet in Aleppo.
-Older sister! -(Turgut) Come on, lion, come on!

text: Küçük şehzadeyi yakalayalım da Üstad'ı memnun edelim.
english: Let's capture the young prince and please the Master.

text: Siz devam edin Şehzadem, ben yetişirim.
english: You continue, Prince, I will catch up.

text: (Doğan) Beyim sen yetiş, biz arkanı kollarız.
english: (Dogan) My lord, you come quickly, we'll cover your back.

text: Selcan denen o kancığı doğduğuna pişman edeceğim Yiva.
english: bitch Selcan regret being born, Yiva.

text: (Kurdoğlu) Bana yaptığı oyunun cezasını çok ağır ödeyecek.
english: (Kurdoğlu) He will pay dearly for the game he played on me.
I will breathe down his neck like death itself. Will
He wanders around the village like a ball of fire.
(Yiva) The flame burns wherever it wishes.
...I know how to turn that flame to ashes. You'll take the life of

text: O iki canlı kancığın bir canını alacaksın Yiva.
english: one of those two vicious bitches, Yiva.
Before she can hold the child in her womb in her arms... before she can boast of having
given a grandchild to the noble family
I brought you water, get up!

text: Allah'ın izniyle biz hazırız Gündoğdu Bey.
english: With God's permission, we are ready, Mr. Gündoğdu. What's
there something that's bothering you... ...that's upsetting you? It's

text: (Gündoğdu) Siz obadan yola çıkarken, güvenilir Alpleri yanına veririm.
english: (Gündoğdu) When you leave the camp, I will give you trustworthy Alps to accompany you.

text: ...elbet bana her şeyi söylemek zorunda değilsin.
english: ...of course, you don't have to tell me everything.

text: (Deli Demir) Ama benim bilmem gereken bir şey varsa...
english: (Crazy Demir) But if there's anything I need to know...

text: Her daim temkinli olmak iyidir derim beyim.
english: I'd say it's always good to be cautious, sir. We

text: Artık tepemizdeki buluta, esen rüzgâra bile güvenemez olduk.
english: can no longer trust even the clouds above us or the wind that blows.

text: Hadi neyse, sen de kendi hazırlıklarına başla.
english: Anyway, you start your own preparations. Don't say that, sir

text: Benim gibi adamın hazırlığından ne olacak ki?
english: What good would preparation do for a guy like me? I
just need to say goodbye to one person. I'll get it out of the way while I have the

text: Vakit varken ben de onu aradan çıkarayım.

english: Baybora was like a brother to me.

text: Babanı, bu obada beyliği için bizi tehlike görenler öldürdü.
english: Your father was killed by those who saw us as a threat to their rule in this tribe.
What do you want to say?
Your father's killer is Suleyman Shah.

text: Bey deyip, şah bilip, başımıza taç ettiklerimiz...
english: we call lords, whom we regard as kings, whom we crown as our leaders...
...would they plot against our lives, father?

text: Ama ben de senin oğlunsam, bunu onlarını yanına koymam.
english: But if I am your son, I will not let them get away with this.
A'uzu billahi minash-shaytanirrajim. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
(Deli Demir) The caravan has already been assembled.
You will never see our new homeland.

text: Oba kurulduğunda ilk iş, Aykız'ımızı evlendireceğiz.
english: the village is established, the first thing we will do is marry off our Aykız.
...will cry secretly, in a secluded corner.
Because you're not here with me...
...you won't be able to wipe away my tears.

text: Aykız, günü geldiğinde bana bir torun verecek.
english: Aykız will give me a grandchild when the time comes.

text: Sen o bebenin yamru yumru ellerini tutamayacaksın.
english: You won't be able to hold that baby's crooked hands.
...will grow even more weary from your absence.

text: ...sen olmazsan bu obanın Alplerini kim pusatlandırır...
english: ...if you are not here, who will arm the warriors of this tribe?"

text: Ama bu cihanın kendisi de geçici bir kışla değil mi Aybala'm?
english: But isn't this world itself just a temporary barracks, Aybala? When

text: Günü gelip, vakit eriştiğinde ben de göç kervanıyla hakiki yurda kavuşacağım.
english: the day comes and the time is right, I too will join the caravan of migrants and return to my true homeland.
We will be reunited that day...
I saw when I opened my eyes...
...the woman I fell in love with and loved...

text: ...o zamana kadar sen bu soğuk toprağın altındayken...
english: ...while you lie beneath this cold earth...

text: ...ben harlı demir ocağının karşısında dahi üşüyor olacağım.
english: ...I will be shivering even in front of the blazing iron furnace.

text: (Deli Demir) Bunu bil istedim. Allah'a emanet ol.
english: (Crazy Demir) I just wanted you to know this. May God protect you.

text: (Deli Demir) Dünya hali işte, iki kapılı han.
english: (Deli Demir) That's just how the world is , a two-door inn.
The world is the innkeeper, and we are the travelers.

text: (Bozok) Yiyecek lokması, alacak nefesi biten giriyor kara toprağın altına.
english: (Bozok) Those who run out of food and breath go beneath the dark earth.
(Deli Demir) May God increase your patience.
(Crazy Demir) Anyway, see you at the winter camp.
Put down the axe, or I'll slit the child's throat!
need to speed up, my prince.

text: At üstünde sarsıldıkça kanaması artıyor, Ertuğrul.
english: His bleeding is increasing as he is shaken on horseback, Ertuğrul.
Sir, the Ertuğrul family... Did you let

text: (Hayme) Şu merhemleri kolay bir yere koy kızım, yolda oyalamasın elimizi.
english: (Hayme) Put those ointments somewhere easy to find, my daughter, so they don't keep us busy on the way.
(Hayme) Selcan! Don't lift heavy things, my daughter.
God forbid, you're already in pain.

text: (Hayme) Bak ben ne düşündüm biliyor musun?
english: (Hayme) Do you know what I was thinking? It's absolutely wrong for

text: Senin bu gebe halinle kervana kalman hiç doğru değil.
english: you to stay with the caravan while you're pregnant . Come on,
continue the migration with us, okay?
Thank you, Mom. I don't know
...you're right, it's the brain, of course, ask him.

text: (Gündoğdu) Siz de şu silahlığı alın hele.
english: (Gündoğdu) You should also take that gun case.

text: Hayme Ana der ki gözüm arkada kalmasın, sen de bizimle gel.
english: Hayme Ana says, "So that I don't have to worry about you , come with us."
He's been worried since last night.

text: Dün gece ne olmuş da endişelenirmiş?
english: What happened last night that made him worried? I'm having contractions

text: (Selcan) Kervanda yorulurum, bebemin başına bir şey gelir diye düşünürmüş.
english: (Selcan) She used to think, "I'll get tired in the caravan, something might happen to my baby ."

text: (Gündoğdu) Dün geceden sonra ben de endişelenirim.
english: (Gündoğdu) I'm worried too after last night.
I always want you to be in my sight.

text: Oğlun için endişelenirsin demek. Yanında olalım istersin.
english: So you're worried about your son. You want us to be with you.
My lord, we intend to prevent the migration. We failed. We said, let's
deal with Suleyman Shah. It didn't happen

text: Karnında durmasın lafların. Tamamını söyle de rahatla Alpargu.
english: your words to yourself. Tell me the whole thing and get it all off your chest, Alpargu.

text: Sabah kudurmuş eniği saldın Süleyman Şah'ın üzerine...
english: This morning you unleashed a rabid puppy on Suleiman Shah...
...and now we are going to bid him farewell.

text: Senin işlerine pek akıl sır erdiremedim beyim.
english: I could never quite understand your ways, sir.

text: Eğer benim aklım sadece bir adım ötesini görseydi...
english: If my mind could only see one step ahead...
...my name would be Alpargu, my friend.

text: ...düşeceği menzili anladığım için bana Kurdoğlu dediler.
english: They called me Kurdoğlu because I understood the range the arrow would fall into even before I put it on the bowstring.
It is a good omen that you are setting out on this journey with Hayme Ana.

text: Ancak bu uzun yolu, doğru sonuçlandırmayı bilirsen.
english: But only if you know how to bring this long journey to the right conclusion.

text: Süleyman Şah hastalandığından beri başından ayrılmazsın.
english: You haven't left Süleyman Şah's side since he fell ill.

text: Yol boyunca da aynı mahareti gösterecek, Hayme Ana'nın eli ayağı olacaksın.
english: You will demonstrate the same skill throughout the journey, becoming Hayme Ana's right hand.
Of course, my sister. Absolutely no doubt.
My innocent brother. You will win

text: Hayme Ana'nın gözüne öyle bir gireceksin ki...
english: Hayme Ana's favor in such a way that...
...she won't be able to imagine any other bride besides you.

text: Ertuğrul'la evleneceğini hatırlatacaksın ki söylediği laftan cayamasın.
english: You'll have to remind her that she's going to marry Ertuğrul so she can't go back on her word.

text: O kızda gönlü olduğunu Hayme Ana bilmez mi?
english: Hayme Ana know that he has feelings for that girl? A

text: Laf ağızdan bir kere çıkar Gökçe.
english: word once spoken cannot be taken back, Gökçe.

text: Senin gibi masum, iyi yürekli bir kızın gururuyla oynamak...
english: To play with the pride of an innocent, kind-hearted girl like you...
...to shatter your dreams, that wouldn't be fitting for Hayme Ana.

text: Eğer o bunu unuttuysa, sen hatırlatacaksın.
english: If he/she has forgotten, you will remind him/her.

text: ...hasta yatağına düştüğünden beri beyimizin niye başından hiç ayrılmam bilir misin?
english: ... do you know why I haven't left my husband's side since he fell ill and was confined to his bed ?
...that Ertuğrul never disobeys his father's word...

text: ...Süleyman Şah, "Siz evleneceksiniz." dedikten sonra biter bu iş diye.
english: ...that Süleyman Şah said, "You will get married." And then this job is over. That's

text: Hep dua ederim Süleyman Şah bir an önce ayağa kalksın...
english: always pray that Suleiman Shah will recover soon...

text: ...Hayme Ana, Ertuğrul'un karşısında dimdik dursun diye dua et.
english: ...pray that Hayme Ana will stand tall and firm against Ertuğrul . Do everything in your power to make

text: Gökçe gelinim olacak diye ısrar etsin diye...
english: Gökçe insist on being his daughter-in-law...
(Gündoğdu) May you find healing in the lands you've gone to, God willing.

text: (Gündoğdu) Şifa bulasın da yeni yurdunda obanı dimdik ayakta karşılayasın.
english: (Gündoğdu) May you recover and welcome your tribe standing tall in your new homeland.

text: Babam önce Allah'a, sonra sana emanet.
english: My father is entrusted first to God, and then to you.
We no longer know who our friends are or who our enemies are.
The roads are full of scorpions. Be careful.
protect your tribe... your wife, and your children.

text: Bir obada dirlik ve birlik yoksa, göç daha da zordur.
english: If there is no peace and unity within a community, migration becomes even more difficult. It's a

text: İşin çok zor evladım. Allah yardımcın olsun.
english: very difficult job, my son. May God help you.

text: Sağ ol ana. Sen hiç merak etme.
english: Thanks, Mom. Don't you worry at all.

text: Bebesinden keçisine her bir can burada bana emanet.
english: From baby goats to adults, every living creature here is entrusted to my care.
God willing, we will arrive in Aleppo safely.
's go, Alps. In the name of Allah.

text: Su gibi gidin ana. Siz yol aldıkça dertler ardınızda kalsın.
english: Go like water, mother. Let your worries be left behind as you move forward. May you have the opportunity to hold

text: Yeni yurtta düğünler yapmak, torunlarınızı kucağınıza almak nasip olsun inşallah.
english: weddings and hold your grandchildren in your new home, God willing.
God willing, my daughter, God willing.

text: İnşallah kan kardeşimin sıhhate kavuştuğunu duymak nasip olur.
english: Hopefully I will have the chance to hear that my blood brother has recovered . May

text: Allah yol selameti versin Hayme Hatun.
english: God grant you a safe journey, Hayme Hatun.
The Alps are on your side, God willing.

text: Ama siz yine de kendinizi kollayın.
english: But you should still protect yourself.
As we know, the enemy is everywhere.
Remember, Rahman, you learned last night...
How is he doing, Prince? We should go down and take

text: Bir inip baksak iyi olur Ertuğrul.
Burada daha fazla kalmayalım. Tehlikeli olabilir.
english: Let's not stay here any longer. It may be dangerous.

text: Bir an evvel yola çıkalım. Halep'te bakarız hal çaresine.
english: Let's leave as soon as possible. We'll see what happens in Aleppo. Ok
-Ertuğrul... -Will you be able to bear it, Halime?
I can endure it, Ertuğrul Bey.
For the sake of her innocence, forgive my daughter, O Lord.

text: Senin rahmet kapın her zaman açıktır.
english: Your door of mercy is always open.
I am not the cruel one.
You killed Elenora. Even if you were to

text: Beni kırk defa diriltip tekrar öldürsen bile...
english: resurrect me forty times and then kill me again...
...you still wouldn't get what you want from me.
You were like this when you were a child too.

text: Ama ben o inadının nasıl kırılacağını çok iyi biliyorum.
english: But I know exactly how to break that stubbornness of hers.

text: Sahi, dün Halep'te tanıştığımız bedevinin adı neydi?
english: By the way, what was the name of the Bedouin we met in Aleppo yesterday ? The
famous Andalusian Muhiddin Ibn al-Arabi. Instead

text: Seni kırk defa öldüreceğime, onu bir defa öldürsem...
english: of killing you forty times, if I killed him once...
both know he can't kill him.

text: Çocukken de böyle hem inatçı hem de zekiydin.
english: Even as a child, you were both stubborn and intelligent.

text: Ama bu demek değildir ki o bedeviyi tutup...
english: But that doesn't mean I can't grab that Bedouin and...
...throw him into that dungeon over there. Can you bear to watch

text: Onun günbegün çürüdüğünü görmeye dayanabilecek misin?

english: (Male voice) I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.
(Male voice) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: (Bir ağızdan) Allahümme Salli âlâ Seyyidina Muhammedin.
english: (In unison) O Allah, send blessings upon our Prophet Muhammad.

text: Yeni obanın ilk düğünü sizinki olacak.
english: Your wedding will be the first in the new village.
The second one will be with Ertuğrul and me, God willing.
I know you're in love with Ertuğrul.

text: Ama sen de biliyorsun; o, seni bacısı gibi görür.
english: But you know too; He sees you as his sister.
You get lost in your own dreams, you believe them.

text: Kendi kendime gelin güvey olduğum yok.
english: not making things up in my own head.

text: Hele bir göç bitsin, düğününüzü yapacağım dedi.
english: Once the migration is over, I'll have your wedding," he said.
(Man) Come on, get ready. We're setting off.

text: Ertuğrul bunu kabul eder mi sanıyorsun?
english: Do you think Ertuğrul would accept this?
His heart belongs to Halime. One would

text: Bunu görmemek, bilmemek için kör olmak gerek.
english: have to be blind not to see or know this. Don't be so

text: Sen yine de kendinden bu kadar emin olma.
Malum, bu işler kader kısmet bacım.
english: You know, these things are a matter of fate and luck, sister. Of course

text: Dünyanın bin bir türlü hali var.
english: The world has all sorts of facets.

text: Bak, sen de Turgut'la çocukluğundan beri sevdalısınız.
english: Look, you and Turgut have been in love since childhood too.
But you still haven't been reunited. Do

text: Gelin ata binmiş, ya nasip demiş.
english: The bride mounted the horse and said, "May it be my destiny."
...or I'll feed your carcass to the dogs. I know you have

text: Sana sarayın içinden birilerinin yardımcı olduğunu biliyorum.
english: someone inside the palace helping you.
Give me a name, save their life.
-(Woman) What's wrong with this man? -This is poison !
Where does he get the poison?
-Has anyone else entered here besides you? -I don't think so .

text: Zaten hiç kimse onun burada olduğunu bilmiyordu ki.
english: In fact, nobody knew he was here .

text: Muhafızlar bile kimi koruduklarının farkında değil.
english: Even the guards don't realize who they're protecting. I couldn't get a

text: Ağzından tek bir laf bile alamadım.
english: single word out of him. It's my duty to find

text: Bu saraya sızan casusları bulmak boynumun borcu.
english: the spies who infiltrated this palace .

text: Onun ölmesine her kim yardım ettiyse...
...ölüp ölmediğini görmek için buraya geri gelecektir.
english: will come back here to see if he's dead or alive.
...I would like to take care of the body.
At the guards' changing of the shift...

text: ...hiç kimse fark etmeden onu buradan çıkartmanın bir yolunu biliyorum.
english: ...I know a way to get him out of here without anyone noticing .
I don't know how I can ever repay you.

text: ...şimdi de benim için hayatını tehlikeye atıyorsun.
english: ...and now you're putting your life in danger for me. It is an honor for me to serve my Atabey, who made every sacrifice for

text: Hakk'ın yolunda vazifesi için her türlü fedakarlığı yapan...
english: his duty in the path of righteousness
Whoever committed this act of treachery...
I am deeply saddened by your painful loss.
I hope your nephew's death wasn't in vain.

text: Elenora davamız için kendisini feda etti.
english: Elenora sacrificed herself for our cause. Did your

text: Yeğeninin fedakârlığı bir işe yaradı mı?
Sanmam. Hâlâ kayıp sandığa bir adım bile yaklaşamadın.
english: I don't think so. You still haven't gotten even one step closer to the missing chest.
(The Grand Master) But it will be resolved soon.

text: Onun yumuşak karnını gayet iyi biliyorum.
english: I know his Achilles' heel very well.

text: Giovanni'nin dilinin çözüleceğine nasıl bu kadar emin olabiliyorsun?
english: How can you be so sure Giovanni will be able to speak? Let
's call them our mutual friends in Aleppo. With

text: Hayır. Giovanni benim kardeşim değil artık.
english: No. Giovanni is no longer my brother.

text: O, davamıza ihanet etmeyi tercih etti.
english: He chose to betray our cause.

text: Ve bu tercihinin bedelini de ödüyor.
english: And he's paying the price for that choice.

text: Petruccio, Petruccio, sadece ihanet edenler değil...
english: Petruccio, Petruccio, it's not just those who betray...
...those who don't do their jobs properly also pay the price.

text: Kutsal Babamızı Haçlı Seferleri için ikna etmemi istiyorsan...
english: If you want me to persuade our Holy Father to send us on the Crusades...
...you must retrieve the artifacts the Muslims stole from us .

text: Avrupa'ya dönene kadar sana bunu her gün hatırlatacağım...
english: I will remind you of this every day until I return to Europe...
-What was it, Markos? -Titus has arrived at the castle, my lord.

text: Otuz şövalyeyle gidip, iki Türkmen’le dönmüşsün sevgili Titus.
english: went with thirty knights and returned with only two Turkmens, my dear Titus.

text: Bu çocuk sıradan bir Türkmen değil sayın Kardinal.
english: This child is no ordinary Turkmen, Your Honor.
(Titus) He is a Seljuk prince. Is

text: Geçen sefer elinizden kaçırdığınız şehzadelerden değil mi bu?
english: n't this one of the princes you let escape last time?

text: Yaralı bir aslana karşı oldukça cesursun.
english: You're quite brave against a wounded lion.

text: Ama ormanın derinliklerinde iki üç aslanla karşılaşınca kaçacak delik arıyormuşsun.
english: But when you encounter two or three lions deep in the forest, you're looking for a place to hide.
I'm landing in Antakya. I have
some business to attend to in the city.
I will retrieve what was entrusted to me from you when I return. Take
good care of this young man while I'm away. Have a
Take our guest to his palace.
Bring him to the palace as well.

text: Bu haddini bilmez Türkmen, kendisini öldürmem için yalvarsın biraz.
english: This insolent Turkmen should beg me to kill him.
We'll visit a friend first. We will

text: Hem Halime'yle ilgilenir, hem de hayır duasını alırız.
